name: Aquoids
description:
After being captured by a strange creature at the edge of the universe and warped to another dimension, you must find your way home.

  • Recruit Aquoids and battle them against hostile creatures in real time physics based battles.
  • Upgrade your spaceship with enhanced sensors and abilities.
  • Explore procedurally generated space

developer note: developed mostly in 2021/2022. Part of a project of mine to release at least one game a month. Might be very buggy/unpolished.
